name: Qv-Home
0:
”Alexa, show the front door”
”Alexa, unlock the front door”
”Alexa, stop”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control your Smart Camera and Video door Bell with your voice using Amazon Alexa and Qv-Home skill. This skill supports the following type products:
-Smart Camera
-Video Door Bell

First you need a Qv-Home account.
Simply search for "Qv-Home" in the Alexa app, select the Qv-Home skill and Enable it.
Link it to your Qv-Home account by signing in with your Qv-Home account
Discover your devices by asking Alexa “Discover devices” or by pressing the Discover Devices button in the Alexa app
After discovering completed. you're ready to go!

To start controlling your Smart Camera by voice by using one of the following phrases:
"Alexa, show {device name}."

When using Video Door Bell, you need set unlock code first, then control it by voice
"Alexa, unlock {device name}."

The Alexa echo show will ask you the unlock code
Say "1234" example

Alexa echo show support alarm when people press door bell, then you can use
"Alexa, show {device name}."
"Alexa, unlock {device name}."
View camera or unlock the door.
